trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_00<tab>The shinobi seems eager to send you on your way.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at the Hawthorne Hut to find that Eline Roaille has already departed for the Bramble Patch. Rendezvous with Yugiri ahead of what promises to be the dramatic conclusion of your hunt.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_03<tab>With the Domans' aid, you have apprehended Eline Roaille in the act of meeting her imperial contact. Her guilt is now surely beyond dispute. Speak with Yugiri to hear her thoughts on the mission.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_04<tab>Yugiri promises to attend to the aftermath of your hunt, leaving you free to report your recent adventures to Minfilia, back at the Rising Stones.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SEQ_05<tab>Minfilia is shocked to learn of Eline Roaille's arrest and the accusations that have been brought against her. Setting aside her dismay, she informs you that the Scions have made progress in their quest to gain entry into Iceheart's sanctum.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_TODO_02<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_TODO_03<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Ilberd in Gridania.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SHINOBI00080_000_020<tab>Now that the jamming device is no longer at risk, you may safely return to your hunt. Pray rejoin Lady Yugiri. She awaits you at the Hawthorne Hut.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SHINOBI00080_000_021<tab>I shall remain here and have a few words with this sorry lot. Nothing serious, I assure you─just a spot of small talk.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_SHINOBI00080_000_030<tab>I shall remain here and have a few words with this sorry lot. Pray rejoin Lady Yugiri at the Hawthorne Hut.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_040<tab>I am given to understand the mission was a success.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_041<tab>Not a single imperial soldier made it to our position. Thorough work as always, Scion.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_042<tab>By way of reward, we can now turn our attention to Roaille once more. What news, Lady Yugiri?
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_043<tab>My people report that she has departed for the Bramble Patch.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_044<tab>So she means to go ahead with the meeting. Excellent. It is time to close the net around her.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_045<tab>My countrymen and I shall lie in wait in the shadows. Tread warily, my friends.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_001<tab>Just beyond, Roaille is in conversation with an individual clad in the manner of an adventurer. An imperial intermediary, no doubt.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_002<tab>This is it! With me!
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_003<tab>Flame Marshal Eline Roaille! You are under arrest for treason and espionage!
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ADVENTURER00084_000_004<tab>(-Dubious Adventurer-)You were followed, you bloody fool!
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ADVENTURER00084_000_005<tab>(-Dubious Adventurer-)Damnation!
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE_000_006<tab>Hmph...
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_007<tab>You are unarmed, my lady...and scarcely garbed for battle. But if you wish to fight...<var 1A 02 /var>you are welcome to try<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE_000_008<tab>What is the meaning of this, Captain? Would you arrest me for strolling in the Twelveswood? When last I looked, that was no crime─and neither was conversing with passing strangers.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_009<tab>You would feign ignorance, then? Very well.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_ILBERD_000_010<tab>If you do think of something to say, there will be plenty of time to say it later. Now, come quietly, or I shall make you wish you had.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_FLAMEMARSHALROAILLE_000_011<tab>I will offer you no struggle. After all, I have naught to hide.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_050<tab>Even a warrior of Roaille's renown could not have hoped to escape by force. Despite her claims, her surrender does not bespeak innocence, but an awareness that her position is untenable.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_051<tab>With the Ivy thus uprooted, it is to be hoped that the tendrils she entwined around the Immortal Flames will gradually wither and die.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_052<tab>Mayhap then the people of Ul'dah will have the Grand Company they deserve. But let us speak of the present. If I may ask, what will you do now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_053<tab>...So the Scions seek a way into Iceheart's sanctum.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_054<tab>Then I daresay you are eager to return to the Rising Stones. Pray do not let me keep you.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_055<tab>Fear not─my countrymen and I shall tend to the aftermath. You need not waste your talents here.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_056<tab>And speaking of talents, you have been training in the art of the shinobi, have you not? The change in your bearing is quite evident─to me, at least. I look forward to seeing you in action. Till next time, my friend.

TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_YUGIRI_000_057<tab>And speaking of talents, have you considered training in the art of the shinobi? You have the aptitude for it, I believe, so please give it some thought. Till next time, my friend.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_MINFILIA_000_060<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I understand that Alphinaud had a task for you. May I ask what it was?
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_MINFILIA_000_061<tab>Charges of treason and espionage against Eline Roaille? I can scarce believe it...
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_MINFILIA_000_062<tab>Could there not have been some manner of misunderstanding...?
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_MINFILIA_000_064<tab>No, it avails us naught to dwell on it. Whatever the truth may be, we must trust to the authorities to uncover it.
TEXT_GAIUSE413_00081_MINFILIA_000_065<tab>Let us speak of another matter. I am pleased to report that we have made progress in our efforts to find a way into Iceheart's sanctum...
